table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vgsvisualpipeline` ( `vgsvisualpipelineid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `sourcefieldname` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `sourcemodule` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vgsvisualpipelineid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
